Likewise, the renovation of 3 outdoor cabins is necessary due to serious deficiencies. structures that mean that the data may be altered by climatic interference in the equipment, and the acquisition of 2 air conditioning units to renew two units that do not work correctly. Additionally, the acquisition of an uninterruptible power supply system (UPS) for the Monfragüe cabin with the double objective of protecting the station's analyzer equipment, as well as allowing power supply in case of system failure for a period of time. enough to allow an emergency shutdown of the station. Summary: Remote Reading Service with Supply and Installation of Meters in the Province of Córdoba. Description: The purpose of this contract is the supply and installation of 2,838 water meters (calibers from 13 mm to 100 mm) equipped with an NBIoT modem and the associated remote reading connectivity service in several municipalities in the province of Córdoba, including all community, individual, industrial, commercial and public service meters. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: RECTORATE OF THE POLYTECHNIC UNIVERSITY OF VALENCIA. Summary: Supply of Laptops for the Polytechnic University of Valencia. Description: The Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV) has a laptop loan service aimed at guaranteeing that all students can access digital teaching resources and the necessary tools under equal conditions. for the development of their academic activity. This service constitutes a key element to minimize the digital divide and ensure that no student is excluded due to lack of adequate technological means. In recent years, a significant part of the laptop fleet currently available has reached the end of its technological useful life. Specifically, many computers cannot be updated to the Windows 11 operating system as they do not meet the minimum security and hardware requirements, among which stands out the absence of TPM 2.0 modules or other functionalities necessary to guarantee secure boot, system integrity and data protection. This limitation prevents equipment from being maintained in conditions that comply with the policies. cybersecurity institutions and current standards for protection against threats. As a consequence, said equipment is no longer suitable for academic use and cannot continue to be safely integrated into the IT infrastructure of the University. Furthermore, the physical deterioration associated with its age and the increasing difficulty in obtaining spare parts increase the risk of interruptions in the loan service, affecting.... Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-01-28. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: RECTORATE OF THE POLYTECHNIC UNIVERSITY OF VALENCIA
output.Summary: Supply of Laptops for the Polytechnic University of Valencia

This service constitutes a key element to minimize the digital divide and ensure that no student is excluded due to lack of adequate technological means. In recent years, a significant part of the laptop fleet currently available has reached the end of its technological useful life. Summary: Gourmet Card Service for Employees of the Santa Cruz Palace Headquarters of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, European Union and Cooperation. Description: The General Subdirectorate of Personnel, in the performance of its functions recognized in section b) of article 21.1 of Royal Decree 1184/2024, of November 28, which develops the basic organic structure of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, European Union and Cooperation, aims to provide civil servants, including interns and labor officials who provide services at the headquarters of the Department located in Plaza de la Provincia nº1 (Palacio de Santa Cruz) with a service for issuing gourmet card as there is no cafeteria service in these facilities. In this way, it is intended to cover part of the food expenses of the staff of said headquarters in a situation of active duty, with morning and afternoon shifts, with special dedication and with special days and schedules. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: BARCELONA CLINICAL RESEARCH FOUNDATION - INSTITUTE OF BIOMEDICAL RESEARCH AUGUST PI I SUNYER (FRCB-IDIBAPS). Summary: F25.064Ch - Supply, Installation, Commissioning and Post-Warranty Maintenance of a Confocal Microscope for Multispectral Imaging with Fluorescence Lifetime Information.... Description: F25.064CH - SUPPLY, INSTALLATION, COMMISSIONING AND POST-WARRANTY MAINTENANCE OF A CONFOCAL MICROSCOPE FOR MULTISPECTRAL IMAGING WITH FLUORESCENCE LIFETIME INFORMATION... Supply, installation, commissioning and post-warranty maintenance of a confocal microscope for multispectral images with fluorescence lifetime information, for the Barcelona Clinical Research Foundation - Consorci Institut d'Investigacions Biomédiques August Pi i Sunyer, according to technical characteristics and conditions defined in the technical specifications specifications. input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: CITY COUNCIL OF REUS. Summary: Supply of Two Vehicles for Mobile Waste Collection. Description: Description of the service: The purpose of this contract is the supply of 2 trucks (category N1) bodied, with the box and marked and with all the technical characteristics as stipulated in the specification sheet in order to renovate the current vehicles that are used for mobile waste disposal. These vehicles will have to carry out the function of collecting, storing and transporting the waste provided by the public. The trucks will be new without prior registration. Vehicles from kilometer 0 or used. The object of the contract has a direct impact on ODS 11 (Sustainable Cities and Communities) and ODS 13 (Climate Action), as well as more indirect benefits that are not so obvious, such as promoting the circular economy.. Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2026-01-10. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Hiring a computer application in the field of pharmacotechnics It mainly undertakes: -That it is a complete program in pharmacotechnics functionalities with an installed base in Health Centers in Spain and/or Europe. -That it starts from a multicenter model by design and therefore allows the centralization of the installation in a single database and the management of masters and unified tables for all SCS Centers. In general, mappings with the teachers decided for this project will be avoided so that codes and descriptions are the same for everyone. the Centers. In addition, the maintenance of masters will be carried out corporately by the people authorized to do so. -That it incorporates traceability, quality control, safety of the patient and the healthcare professional. -That it can be adapted to the database of SCS medications (hereinafter, DragoMED), to the SCS Hospital Pharmacy Information System (hereinafter, DragoFARMA), and to other SCS corporate programs. Description: The purpose of this supply contract through a framework agreement is to establish the legal and economic regime applicable to the supply of residual gas analyzers (RGA) and associated components: quadrupole gas analyzer heads (RGA) and its associated electronic units, power supplies and associated radiation-resistant extenders, necessary for the set of facilities of the ALBA Synchrotron Light Laboratory of CELLS that operate with the vacuum system and for the beam lines currently in operation, those that are in the testing/construction and design phase and for the future lines that during the validity of this Agreement are in a design phase that allows us to know, even approximately, the needs of this type of components.
